channel.title: Noblescape718- working nex- working kiln and fight caves- drop party at 15
channel.description:
downloadable client: http://up.ht/138bkKY (this requires winrar if you dont have winrar then you can find it here) winrar.todownload.com
forums: http://www.noblescape.smfnew.com
webclient: coming tomorrow ^check forums daily until then use the dl client.
Noblescape is finally back in a new and improved 718 server! and we plan to stay for a long time. with a dedicated coder, and an amazing community, we can personally garuntee that you will have a fun time. come on down and check it out
current staff
owner/coder: benni
co-owner: god <-- sexy beast
head admin: bigmike <-- loves men
admin: open
admin: open
head moderator: ali
moderator: nick
moderator: open
moderator: open
moderator: open
head helper: open
helper: open
helper: open
helper: open
helper: open
earn staff, dont just come in and expect it
donator benefits
Donator Status: $5 Benefits: You are able to wear donator items, have access to ::yell command and fully access to donatorzone that includes three special shops. Potion flask store, pet store, and the Donator items store. THE ABILITY TO USE THE ::BANK COMMAND. ::blueskin ::greenskin
Extreme Donator Status: $10 Extra benefits: Level 99 in a skill of your free choice and 2 free items of your own choice,
King Donator Status: $25 Extra benefits: level 99 in two skills of your free choice and 5 free items of your choice. along with a custom yell tag.
server features
working spirit shields quest tab teleport system NO DUPES working curses perfect soulsplit formula WORKING FIGHT CAVES - JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE working korasi polypore dungeon WORKING NEX- JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE fully working god wars dungeon fully working clan wars portals safe and dangerous intricate pvp shop WORKING KILN - JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE revenants for pvp armours amazing community fantastic staff BOOSTED DROP RATES working tormented demons working hand cannon fully working slayer frost dragons AND SO MUCH MORE
come try out the best server of your life today (remember it's a work in progress, many awesome things still being added)
DONT FORGET TO VOTE: http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/details-23542-Noblescape718.html

item.title: Noblescape718- working nex- working kiln and fight caves- drop party at 15
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Mezzyscape562:

My server only costs 15 bucks for admin … Yours are waaay over price idk what kind of rich ass motherloveer will buy it.

Your server shouldn’t cost anything for admin. Admin should be earned. It’s also against the rules lol:

[quote=“Taharok, post:1, topic:445166”]These are the current rules of the board:

[ul][li]There is one exact restriction. On this website or off, staff ranks must not be sold for anything.[/li][/ul][/quote]

Read full topic
